instruction: Develop a system to monitor gaming servers.
output:
A system to monitor gaming servers should include the following components: 
- Network performance monitoring for latency and bottlenecks
- Monitoring of resource usage to identify high utilization
- WAN, SAN, and Internet traffic monitoring
- Analysis of user activity statistics
- Real-time alerts in case of security threats
- Monitoring of user access logs
- Server load balancing
- Database and application performance monitoring
- Automated maintenance and recovery actions
